short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Open a blank page every time you click new tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension opens a blank page every time you click the plus icon or new tab icon in the browser. 

It is a very very small extension. Just 2 KB. And it works like charm. It is superfast and has no impact on your browser speed.

No permission is required to run this extension. It collects no data and requires no internet connection.
